content.question: For 0 ≤ t ≤ 4 at what time t is the amount of sewage in the treatment tank greatest? To the nearest gallon, what is the maximum amount of sewage in the tank? Justify your answers.

frqParts.text: For 0 ≤ t ≤ 4 at what time t is the amount of sewage in the treatment tank greatest? To the nearest gallon, what is the maximum amount of sewage in the tank? Justify your answers.

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
